QuestData.Title: Ignition
QuestData.Description: This guy just won't go down!$b$bYou're doin' great, kid. Only one thing left to do.$b$bAccording to my research, there should be a titan statue down below. Use the device to activate it, then break it down.$b$bIf my theory is correct, that statue holds the key to reactivating this obelisk.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover the Lens of the Sun.
QuestData.CompletionText: Time to see if this old mechanism still works...
QuestData.RewardText: According to Harrison's notes, placing the lens upon this dais should re-activate this obelisk.$b$bExactly what that means remains to be seen...
